IN the INTEREST OF: J.R.M., a Minor Petition of: Luzerne County Children and Youth Services In the Interest of: A.R.P., a Minor Petition of: Luzerne County Children and Youth No. 67 MAL 2018
No. 68 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 27, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 27th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
